author: Jacob Knutson
title: Cuomo says Trump's mandatory quarantine comments "really panicked people"
description: New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo said in a press conference Sunday that President Donald Trump's unexpected Saturday announcement of a possible "short-term" quarantine of New York, New Jersey and parts of Connecticut to curb the spread of the coronavirus "really pa…
